mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownumber, @rownum id, t1.timeSlot, SUM(t1.guestCount) guestCount, SUM(t1.billCount) billCount, t1.guestPerTime, t1.guestPerCost, SUM(t1.foodAmtSum)foodAmtSum, SUM(t1.payAmt) payAmt, SUM(t1.oughtAmt) oughtAmt, t1.shopName, t1.shopC FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=0, date_format(b.dtBillTime,'%H') timeSlot, SUM(b.iGuestNum) guestCount, COUNT(b.CBILL_C) billCount, case when SUM(b.iGuestNum) = 0 then 0 else floor(60 / SUM(b.iGuestNum)) end guestPerTime, case when SUM(b.iGuestNum) = 0 then 0 else ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / SUM(b.iGuestNum),2 ) end guestPerCost, SUM(nFoodAmt) foodAmtSum, SUM(nPayAmt) payAmt, SUM(nOughtAmt) oughtAmt, b.CBRANCH_N shopName, b.CBRANCH_C shopC FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b WHERE ${queryText} GROUP BY b.CBRANCH_C, b.CBRANCH_N, date_format(b.dtBillTime,'%H') )t1 GROUP BY t1.shopC,t1.shopName,t1.timeSlot,t1.guestCount,t1.billCount, t1.guestPerTime, t1.guestPerCost, t1.foodAmtSum ,t1.payAmt,t1.oughtAmt with rollup
